question: Is there a role for gamma knife in treatment of Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder?
ideal_answer: Yes. Gamma knife radiosurgery is being increasingly to treat refractory obsessive- compulsive disorder (OCD). It is reserved for severe, treatment-refractory disease that has not responded to multiple treatments.
